author: Joshua Fluke
description:
AG1 has their best offer ever! subscribe with my link https://drinkag1.com/joshuafluke or scan the QR code and you’ll unlock 7 free gifts worth $126. Thanks to AG1 for sponsoring today’s video!

Apparently, if you’re bored at work… that’s now a workplace “condition” costing your employer thousands of dollars. Not because the job is meaningless, or because the company hired you too early, or because the project got deprioritized — no, no… it's your fault. Again.

In today’s video, we break down:

Why “boreout” is nothing but recycled corporate jargon from two years ago

How companies keep inventing new buzzwords to blame workers instead of fixing bad workplaces

Why boredom at work is usually a management problem, not a worker problem

The wild logic that says disengaged employees are “costing the company money”… even when the job itself has no purpose

The never-ending cycle of corporate expectations: be engaged, be excited, be loyal, but also… do more with less

How corporate culture
title: WTF IS BOREOUT? (THE NEXT DUMB CORPORATE BUZZWORD!)
